DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the pharmacokinetics of sildenafil which is used as treatment of pulmonary hypertension in neonate and preterm infant.
DOC.brief_title: PK Study of Sildenafil in Neonate
DOC.criteria: Admitted at NICU in Seoul National University Hospital or Bundang Seoul National University hospital Infants who were diagnosed with PAH Severe allergic reaction to sildenafil Inotropics for hypotension within 3 days prior to enrollment AST or ALT > 3x ULN Any condition that would make the participant, in the opinion of the investigator, unsuitable for the stud
